N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 57.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

On and after January 1, 1971 every trailer except a
semitrailer, while being drawn upon the public highways of this State, shall be
attached to the vehicle drawing the same by a device of a type approved by the

Commissioner of Motor Vehicles. Accordingly, the commissioner establishes this

Part relating to vehicle connecting arrangements used for drawing trailers by
mechanical power on the public highways. This Part is not for those
arrangements used for drawing another vehicle by means of a tow truck or
wrecker or a semitrailer made into a full trailer by means of a converter
dolly. Notes
